actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to extend until October 1, 1986, the authority and authorization of appropriations for certain programs under the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #117 (309-104)) Amends the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to extend the authority and authorize appropriations for FY 1985 and 1986 for the fisheries loan fund and for the incidental expenses of volunteers for certain programs under the Act. Amends the American Fisheries Promotion Act to extend the authority and authorize appropriations for FY 1985 and 1986 for loans to avoid default on obligations covering fishing vessels and loans to cover fishing vessel operating losses. Limits loans to avoid default regarding reconstructed or reconditioned fishing vessels to vessels reconstructed or reconditioned in the United States. Repeals the requirement that the vessel be used in the harvesting of fish from an underutilized fishery.

titles.title: A bill to extend until October 1, 1986, the authority and authorization of appropriations for certain programs under the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956.
